title: Mobile-Based Art Technology Development Course for Adults with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and willingness for artistic expression
context.additional_context: Evening classes twice weekly for working professionals, with personalized learning assistant support.

learning_goals: By the end of the 4-week course, learners will create at least three digital drawing works and one 15-second animation using mobile devices (e.g., Procreate, FlipaClip) and submit outcomes meeting at least four of five feedback checklist criteria per artwork.
Performing physical expression and basic dance movement practice in a VR environment

Through a 3-4 member team project, learners will produce one art piece addressing local community issues and deliver a 10-minute presentation with artwork explanation at a regional cultural center exhibition within two weeks after the course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
